title: Bg. 18.69
sanskrit: न च तस्मान्मनुष्येषु कश्चिन्मे प्रियकृत्तम: ।भविता न च मे तस्मादन्य: प्रियतरो भुवि ॥ ६९ ॥
transliteration: na ca tasmān manuṣyeṣukaścin me priya-kṛttamaḥbhavitā na ca me tasmādanyaḥ priya-taro bhuvi
literary_trans: There is no servant in this world more dear to Me than he, nor will there ever be one more dear.There is no servant in this world more dear to Me than he, nor will there ever be one more dear.
